nnsec.net
Class NetIFace.Node

java.lang.Object
  nnsec.net.NetIFace.Node
Enclosing interface:
NetIFace
public static class NetIFace.Node
extends java.lang.Object

Node class is a fundamental piece useful to construct neural networks. Node objects have a value, a threshold, an associated function, a group, and a collection of in/out links.

Constructor Summary

          Default constructor, it creates a standard unhelpful node.
